effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. User charges for one turn before attacking. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. User charges for one turn before attacking. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.
short_effect.emerald: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A 2-turn move that strikes the foe on the 2nd turn.
flavor_text.emerald: A 2-turn move that strikes the foe on the 2nd turn.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Blades of wind hit the foe on the 2nd turn. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
